about_the_game:
Twilight Memoria: Freedom is a story-driven JRPG where two different fate meets and begin anew.

Evelyn, the music band leader, suffered from the trauma of her past, forcing her to keep going forward no matter what even if there's no choice.

Laiza, the daughter of the wealthiest family on the continent, is kept hidden from the world in her mansion by her father. She has the choice she could think of, but her father won't let her choose for her own sake.

Evelyn and Laiza have two completely different lives, yet destiny decides to have them meet, thus opening a new possibility for them.

What will unfold from this destiny?

Core Feature:
• Free turn battle


You can decide which character act first, build combo and wipe all your enemies in one swoop!

• No random encounter


Every enemy are roaming in the map, fight or avoid them, the choices is yours.

• Complex yet interesting equipment system
• Attack-type equipment system


You can choose what Attack-type to equip, match the attack type of your character to your enemy health color, your damage will be multiplied!

• Orb system


You can upgrade or combine orbs gained through battles. Those orbs should be equiped as additional slot to power up your character even further!

• 10 different specialty


Freedom to choose any specialty available for every character! Build your own party any way you want, and craft the ultimate combination to overwhelm your enemies. Every characters comes with Main and Sub Specialty.

Twilight Memoria: Freedom is a story-driven JRPG where two different fate meets and begin anew.

Evelyn, the music band leader, suffered from the trauma of her past, forcing her to keep going forward no matter what even if there's no choice.

Laiza, the daughter of the wealthiest family on the continent, is kept hidden from the world in her mansion by her father. She has the choice she could think of, but her father won't let her choose for her own sake.

Evelyn and Laiza have two completely different lives, yet destiny decides to have them meet, thus opening a new possibility for them.

What will unfold from this destiny?

• Free turn battle


You can decide which character act first, build combo and wipe all your enemies in one swoop!

• Complex yet interesting equipment system

• Orb system


You can upgrade or combine orbs gained through battles. Those orbs should be equiped as additional slot to power up your character even further!

Freedom to choose any specialty available for every character! Build your own party any way you want, and craft the ultimate combination to overwhelm your enemies. Every characters comes with Main and Sub Specialty.
name: Twilight Memoria : Freedom

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: AMD A4-6300 / Intel Pentium G870
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750 / Nvidia GeForce GT 640 / Intel UHD 620
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 Bit 44.1 Khz
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD FX-4330 / Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7750 / Nvidia GeForce GT 740 / Intel UHD 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 24 Bit 192 Khz

short_description: Two lives. Two different fates. Unravel the destiny Evelyn and Laiza will face, changing their lives for better, or for worse. A fateful story packed in JRPG format with complex yet interesting mechanics.
